name: .LMSP File Extension
summary: Learn about .LMSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open LMSP files in LEGO Education EV3 Classroom (cross-platform). To do so, select File â†’ Open File from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your LMSP file.

To install an LMSP file on your EV3 Intelligent Brick, you must pair the Brick with your computer. You can do this by turning on the Brick's Bluetooth or connecting it to your computer using a USB cable and then pressing the connect button found in LEGO Education EV3 Classroom. Then, follow the instructions included with EV3 Classroom to install your LMSP file on your EV3 Intelligent Brick.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
